Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "SDH Institute" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2011)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*‹ The template *Infobox university* is being considered for merging. › **SDH Institute Pte Ltd** ([abbreviation](/wiki/Abbreviation): **School D'Hospitality**; [Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese): 新加坡酒店管理学院) is a [hospitality and tourism management school](/wiki/Hospitality_management_studies) located in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Established in Year 2007, It is registered with the Committee for Private Education (CPE). SDH Institute is a Private Education Institute in Singapore offering hospitality education. SDH Institute offers Hospitality and Tourism Management programs from Certificate, Diploma, Advanced Diploma, Post-Graduate, Bachelor's Degree to MBA and also professional learning programmes. It has a teacher to student ratio at 1:40 for lectures and 1:20 for tutorials with support from full-time lecturers. The school was established in 2007 as **School D' Hospitality**. It changed to its current name on 8 October 2012. ## Partners School D’Hospitality has industry links and internship partners like [Rasa Sentosa Resorts](/wiki/Sentosa), [Hilton Hotels & Resorts](/wiki/Hilton_Hotels_%26_Resorts), [Holiday Inn](/wiki/Holiday_Inn), [Goodwood Park Hotel](/wiki/Goodwood_Park_Hotel), and the [Fullerton Hotel](/wiki/The_Fullerton_Hotel_Singapore). Academic partners include the Association of Business Executives, which is an international examining board and provider of business and management qualifications that lead to degree and [master's](/wiki/Master%27s_degree) routes.
